channel.title: docker desktop on dotNetting
channel.description: Recent content in docker desktop on dotNetting

item.title: How to use Visual Studio without Docker Desktop to debug a .NET Core application running in a container inside WSL
item.description: As the grace period to use Docker Desktop for free is coming to an end, organisations are looking into alternatives to retain much of the convenience Docker Desktop offers, without incurring in the extra costs. One of that convenience is the seamless integration between Visual Studio 2022 (and some previous versions) and docker engine allowing to run and debug applications as naturally as if we were running and debugging them natively on the host.
